data.name: Geyser Glider
data.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

data.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
data.oracle_text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

data.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
data.oracle_text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

data.name: Giant Warthog
data.oracle_text: Trample
data.flavor_text:
"When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."
—Nomad myth

data.name: Gilded Cerodon
data.oracle_text: Whenever Gilded Cerodon attacks, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target creature can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: The plating of its horns is a token of honor from Hazoret, who favors creatures with great hearts.

data.name: Glade Gnarr
data.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

data.name: Glademuse
data.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, if it's not their turn, that player draws a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Rage can be heard throughout the world, but wisdom comes at a whisper."
—Rielle, the Everwise

data.name: Gloomshrieker
data.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Gloomshrieker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
If Gloomshrieker would die, exile it instead.

data.name: Glowering Rogon
data.oracle_text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
data.flavor_text: A herd of one.

data.name: Glowing Anemone
data.oracle_text: When Glowing Anemone enters the battlefield, you may return target land to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Beautiful to behold, terrible to be held.

data.name: Gluetius Maximus
data.oracle_text:
As Gluetius Maximus enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses one of your fingers. (Thumbs are fingers, too.)
When the chosen finger isn't touching Gluetius Maximus, sacrifice Gluetius Maximus.

data.name: Gnarlid Colony
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
If Gnarlid Colony was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
data.flavor_text: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.

data.name: Gnarlid Pack
data.oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

data.name: Godsire
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{T}: Create an 8/8 Beast creature token that's red, green, and white.
data.flavor_text:
"Lay sacrifice to the godsire that it may spare us, but save some for his progeny who also will hunger."
—Syeena, elvish godtoucher

data.name: Goretusk Firebeast
data.oracle_text: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.

data.name: Graf Mole
data.oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Their keen sense of smell draws them to the unnatural. To find one is a boon."
—Veka, hinterland inspector

data.name: Grave Sifter
data.oracle_text: When Grave Sifter enters the battlefield, each player chooses a creature type and returns any number of cards of that type from their graveyard to their hand.
data.flavor_text: It claws at the earth in a vain attempt to reclaim what it once was.

data.name: Graxiplon
data.oracle_text: Graxiplon can't be blocked unless defending player controls three or more creatures that share a creature type.
data.flavor_text:
"Attempts to revive this ancient species have not been entirely successful, but results indicate potential for future development."
—Riptide Project researcher

data.name: Grazing Kelpie
data.oracle_text:
{G/U}, Sacrifice Grazing Kelpie: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

data.name: Greater Gargadon
data.oracle_text:
Suspend 10—{R}
Sacrifice an artifact, creature, or land: Remove a time counter from Greater Gargadon. Activate only if Greater Gargadon is suspended.

data.name: Great-Horn Krushok
data.flavor_text: Perfectly suited for life in the Shifting Wastes, the krushok is well protected by its horn, its hide, and its temper.

data.name: Gristleback
data.oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Sacrifice Gristleback: You gain life equal to Gristleback's power.
data.flavor_text: Loyal in battle, hearty in stew.

data.name: Groffskithur
data.oracle_text: Whenever Groffskithur becomes blocked, you may return target card named Groffskithur from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: It growls not to threaten, but to summon.

data.name: Grollub
data.oracle_text: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.
data.flavor_text: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

data.name: Gruul Nodorog
data.oracle_text: {R}: Gruul Nodorog gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
data.flavor_text:
Petting the nodorog
—Gruul expression meaning "making a really big mistake"

data.name: Gruul Ragebeast
data.oracle_text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.
data.flavor_text:
"If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

data.name: Guardian Beast
data.oracle_text: As long as Guardian Beast is untapped, noncreature artifacts you control can't be enchanted, they have indestructible, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove Auras already attached to those artifacts.

data.name: Gulf Squid
data.oracle_text: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.
data.flavor_text: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

data.name: Gurzigost
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gurzigost unless you put two cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
{G}{G}, Discard a card: You may have Gurzigost assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren't blocked.

data.name: Helium Squirter
data.oracle_text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

data.name: Herald of the Forgotten
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Herald of the Forgotten enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return any number of target permanent cards with cycling abilities from your graveyard to the battlefield.

data.name: Herd Baloth
data.oracle_text: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Herd Baloth, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
data.flavor_text: Baloth social structure is simple: the biggest one's the leader.

data.name: Herd Gnarr
data.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Herd Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Long ago, the solitary gnarr was a sign of good luck. Now they have become wild pack hunters, a sign of impending danger.

data.name: Highcliff Felidar
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Highcliff Felidar enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. Destroy those creatures.
data.flavor_text: Once the felidar has marked you as prey, there's no point in running.

data.name: Hollowhenge Beast
data.flavor_text: In a world of monsters, it's the stuff of nightmares.

data.name: Hundroog
data.oracle_text: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text:
"New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis."
—Riptide Project researcher

data.name: Hunted Wumpus
data.oracle_text: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

data.name: Hunted Wumpus
data.oracle_text: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

When you cast this spell, you gain half X life and draw half X cards. Round down each time.

data.name: Hystrodon
data.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Hystrodon deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

data.name: Indrik Stomphowler
data.oracle_text: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
data.flavor_text:
"An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances."
—Simic research notes

data.name: Infernal Spawn of Evil
data.oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
{1}{B}, Reveal Infernal Spawn of Evil from your hand, Say "It's coming!": Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

all_parts.name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil

data.name: Infernius Spawnington III, Esq.
data.oracle_text:
Flying, first strike, trample, haste
This spell costs {3} less to cast for each card you've revealed this turn.
When Infernius Spawnington III, Esq. enters the battlefield, you may say "I'm here." If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player.

all_parts.name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil

data.flavor_text: See evil, hear evil, speak evil.

data.name: Insatiable Souleater
data.oracle_text: {G/P}: Insatiable Souleater gains trample until end of turn. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
data.flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for culling our sick so that the strong may earn their triumphs."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

data.name: Intrusive Packbeast
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
data.flavor_text: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

data.name: Iron-Barb Hellion
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Iron-Barb Hellion can't block.
data.flavor_text: When you feel a rumble in the ground, hold perfectly still. One sound will bring the hellion.

data.name: Ironclad Krovod
data.flavor_text:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura

data.name: Jackalope Herd
data.oracle_text: When you cast a spell, return Jackalope Herd to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: There's little more demeaning than getting your butt kicked by a bunch of bunnies.

data.name: Kalonian Behemoth
data.oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
data.flavor_text:
"Do not fire upon it—it is bad luck. And a waste of arrows."
—Alera Benath, Kalonian ranger

data.name: Kalonian Tusker
data.flavor_text:
"And all this time I thought *we* were tracking *it*."
—Juruk, Kalonian tracker

data.name: Karplusan Wolverine
data.oracle_text: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

data.name: Karstoderm
data.oracle_text:
Karstoderm enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, remove a +1/+1 counter from Karstoderm.

data.name: Kazandu Stomper
data.oracle_text:
Trample
When Kazandu Stomper enters the battlefield, return up to two lands you control to their owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Elves revere cycles of renewal, but they prefer cycles that don't involve their homes getting smashed.

data.name: Kelpie Guide
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent you control.
{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
data.flavor_text: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.

data.name: Kezzerdrix
data.oracle_text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

data.name: Kiln Fiend
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

data.name: Kjeldoran Frostbeast
data.oracle_text: At end of combat, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by Kjeldoran Frostbeast.
data.flavor_text:
"Two of my Warriors found that the creature was dangerous not only in combat, but also in simple proximity."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

data.name: Krakilin
data.oracle_text:
Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.
data.flavor_text:
"A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

data.name: Kranioceros
data.oracle_text: {1}{W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"A surly beast, the kranioceros will raise its defenses at the smallest threat. Stay out of sight and downwind, or you'll disrupt its natural migrations."
—Ebrel, godtoucher mentor

data.name: Krosan Beast
data.oracle_text: Threshold — Krosan Beast gets +7/+7 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: Those who see the squirrels go underground in the winter aren't ready for what emerges in the spring.

data.name: Krosan Beast
data.oracle_text: Threshold — Krosan Beast gets +7/+7 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: The true Fist of Krosa is big and furry.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.

data.oracle_text: Morph {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
data.flavor_text: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather.

data.name: Krosan Groundshaker
data.oracle_text: {G}: Target Beast creature gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: You know it's coming when you hear the distant thunder. You know where it's been when you see the path of broken trees.

Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
data.flavor_text: It turns prey into predator.

data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 6 or greater, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.
data.flavor_text: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.

data.name: Laccolith Grunt
data.oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.

data.oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan assigns no combat damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: Proximity guarantees injury or death.

data.oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior assigns no combat damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: The screams are brief. The silence lingers.

data.name: Laccolith Whelp
data.oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: They don't feed; they stoke.

data.flavor_text: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

Trample

"Rely too much on your weapons and watch your dreams shatter in your hands."
—Rhonas, god of strength

Flying
